mapper.insert: insert into tb_file_detail (file_id, file_name, file_path, sha_512, sha_256, sha_1, md5, create_datetime) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sha512,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sha256,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sha1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_file_detail set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sha_512 = #{sha512,jdbcType=CHAR}, sha_256 = #{sha256,jdbcType=CHAR}, sha_1 = #{sha1,jdbcType=CHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_datetime = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select file_id, file_name, file_path, sha_512, sha_256, sha_1, md5, create_datetime from tb_file_detail
